message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $18,000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your suggestion, but I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $18,000 is really the lowest I can go. This product is high-quality and worth every penny. I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment. What do you say?

Hello Alice, I understand your position, but unfortunately, I am still unable to meet your asking price of $18,000. I would like to offer $16,000 for the product. I hope this revised offer is more in line with what you're looking for.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  To make this work, I can come down to $17,000.  This is my final offer, as I already have another interested buyer.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to offer $16,500 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your needs and allows us to move forward with the transaction.
